doc.field: Noshyign' noshyign' dzinatagntth'äł tuu nįįłąy danh, mänh shyiit tatagntth'äł.
Noshyign' noshyign' dzinatagntth'äł tuu nįįłąy danh, mänh shyiit tatagntth'äł.
down, down where I rush down with the swiftly flowing water, I will fall with the water into the lake.
